title: 港藝術家推震撼「動畫」提醒世界「反送中遠非勝利」網友求國語版本
contents:
推文

對話

[url=https://twitter.com/i/status/1170924824585048064][/url]A group of artists who love HK made this animated video to remind the world the withdrawal of the bill is far from a victory for Hong Kong. In fact, it is quite the opposite.
[url=https://twitter.com/i/status/1170924824585048064][/url]
[url=https://twitter.com/i/status/1170924824585048064][/url]YouTube: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=1O40FVu7Uds&feature=youtu.be
[url=https://twitter.com/i/status/1170924824585048064][/url]
[url=https://twitter.com/i/status/1170924824585048064][/url]#PasstheHongKongHumanRightsAndDemocracyAct
[url=https://twitter.com/i/status/1170924824585048064][/url]Translated from 英文 by[url=https://translate.google.com/][/url]
[url=https://twitter.com/i/status/1170924824585048064][/url]一群熱愛香港的藝術家製作了這部動畫視頻，提醒全世界該法案的撤銷遠非香港的勝利。事實上，情況正好相反。 
[url=https://twitter.com/i/status/1170924824585048064][/url]
